# p6-modal

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute  | Description                                    | Type      | Default |
| --------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `hasCard` | `has-card` | Display a modal with a head, a body and a foot | `boolean` | `false` |
| `open`    | `open`     | Open the modal                                 | `boolean` | `false` |
